name: GeneralKnowledgeQuestions
0:
”Alexa, open general knowledge questions”
”Alexa, start general knowledge questions”
”Alexa, launch general knowledge questions”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: general knowledge questions
Developer Terms of Use
des:
General Knowledge Questions is an Alexa skill designed to test your general knowledge, whether you're playing solo or with friends!

Single player Mode:

Answer a wide variety of new general knowledge questions with a simple "yes" or "no."
Earn points: Each correct answer gives you 1 point.
Check your score: You can ask for your current points at any time by saying "stop."
After every 10 questions, your total score will be announced.

Multiplayer Mode:

Challenge your friends and family! Now you can play multiplayer mode with up to 4 players.
Every 20 questions, the scores will be revealed to see who’s leading.

To end the game earlier just say "stop" and alexa will announce all the scores achieved by the players and close the skill.

Try multiplayer mode now and see who among your friends or family has the best general knowledge!
